item.title: Contact
item.dc:creator: rodrigo
item.content:encoded:
Contact Us

High-quality, ethically sourced products at affordable prices. If you fall in love with furniture you can always decide to buy it.

Customer Care

For questions about your order or general inquiries, email us at help@botiga.com

Visit Our Store

Austin, Texas
6391 Elgin St. Celina

Follow Us

You may also fill out the form below and we will respond as quickly as possible.

item.title: Why you have to digitalize in 2021
item.dc:creator: rodrigo
item.content:encoded:
In an era when world population and the consumption of resources are increasing, finding ways to make our planet more sustainable is essential.

High-quality, ethically sourced products at affordable prices. If you fall in love with furniture you can always decide to buy it — each monthly payment on furniture goes towards owning.

High-quality, ethically sourced products at affordable prices. If you fall in love with furniture you can always decide to buy it — each monthly payment on furniture goes towards owning.

In an era when world population

High-quality, ethically sourced products at affordable prices. If you fall in love with furniture you can always decide to buy it — each monthly payment on furniture goes towards owning.

High-quality, ethically sourced products at affordable prices. If you fall in love with furniture you can always decide to buy it — each monthly payment on furniture goes towards owning.

  • Roughly half of the animal species and 80% of biodiversity live in forests, which cover about one-third of the planet's landmass
  • They regulate precipitation throughout the world by evaporating water on an enormous scale
  • They regulate temperature by absorbing carbon dioxide, which would otherwise warm the atmosphere
  • They provide us with 75% of the medicinal ingredients we use every day

  • They regulate precipitation throughout the world by evaporating water on an enormous scale
  • They regulate temperature by absorbing carbon dioxide, which would otherwise warm the atmosphere
  • They provide us with 75% of the medicinal ingredients we use every day

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: rodrigo
item.content:encoded:
Best Furniture In Town

Give the best wishes to your loved ones.

Shop Now →

The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog

High-quality furniture delivered & assembled in less than a week that can change as your life changes

How it Works
Explore Bedroom

Headline that grabs people's attention goes here

Oval Sofa

from $20

Cozy Living Couch

from $50

Corner Chair

from $100

High Quality Furniture

High-quality, ethically sourced products at affordable prices. If you fall in love with furniture you can always decide to buy it — each monthly payment on furniture goes towards owning.

Browse Furnitures

MEET A FOURNIR MEMBER

Fournir member C Kent

High-quality, ethically sourced products at affordable prices. If you fall in love with furniture you can always decide to buy it

Fournir member C Kent

High-quality, ethically sourced products at affordable prices. If you fall in love with furniture you can always decide to buy it

See more reviews

WHY FOURNIR

A sustainable alternative to fast furniture

High-quality, ethically sourced products at affordable prices. If you fall in love with furniture you can always decide to buy it

Quality, without the expense or commitment

High-quality, ethically sourced products at affordable prices. If you fall in love with furniture you can always decide to buy it

Designed to last.
And last. And last.

High-quality, ethically sourced products at affordable prices. If you fall in love with furniture you can always decide to buy it

About Fournir

Heading title goes here

Explore membership plans and pricing, and see how amazing it can be to live free of the burdens of ownership

Learn More

IN THE PRESS

item.title: Why you have to digitalize in 2021
item.dc:creator: rodrigo
item.content:encoded:
In an era when world population and the consumption of resources are increasing, finding ways to make our planet more sustainable is essential.

High-quality, ethically sourced products at affordable prices. If you fall in love with furniture you can always decide to buy it — each monthly payment on furniture goes towards owning.

High-quality, ethically sourced products at affordable prices. If you fall in love with furniture you can always decide to buy it — each monthly payment on furniture goes towards owning.

In an era when world population

High-quality, ethically sourced products at affordable prices. If you fall in love with furniture you can always decide to buy it — each monthly payment on furniture goes towards owning.

High-quality, ethically sourced products at affordable prices. If you fall in love with furniture you can always decide to buy it — each monthly payment on furniture goes towards owning.

  • Roughly half of the animal species and 80% of biodiversity live in forests, which cover about one-third of the planet's landmass
  • They regulate precipitation throughout the world by evaporating water on an enormous scale
  • They regulate temperature by absorbing carbon dioxide, which would otherwise warm the atmosphere
  • They provide us with 75% of the medicinal ingredients we use every day

In an era when world population

High-quality, ethically sourced products at affordable prices. If you fall in love with furniture you can always decide to buy it — each monthly payment on furniture goes towards owning.

  • Roughly half of the animal species and 80% of biodiversity live in forests, which cover about one-third of the planet's landmass
  • They regulate precipitation throughout the world by evaporating water on an enormous scale
  • They regulate temperature by absorbing carbon dioxide, which would otherwise warm the atmosphere
  • They provide us with 75% of the medicinal ingredients we use every day
